name: Anchor Watch (free)
description: This is a Anchor Watch application, it is very easy to use, you can simply active the app after you have dropped your anchor and prepared the boat. You dont have to know the exact coordinates of the anchor, you only need the bearing and the distance to your anchor, thats all.  + Background task support, alarm is still active when you use other apps  + Drop anchor and adjust alarm easily via drag & drop + Set advanced drift radius, very useful when there are many boats on the anchorage or you anchoring between mooring boys + Fully offline, doesnt need a internet connection + Display of the OpenSeaMap data http://www.openseamap.org/ (Copyright: http://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright/), this is completely optional and also possible without internet connection. For usage of the map in offline mode, please see: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwM5wbp9dvnbQzhmWnNlOFhZLWM/view. + Configurable measure units: Metric, nautical miles, feet + Possibility to rotate map according to the device compass  Permission used: + Fine GPS location: To monitor your location + Wake lock: To wake up phone during alarm + Vibrate: For the alarm + Full internet access: For displaying the OpenSeaMap data and for Google AdMob (only free version) + Network state: For displaying the OpenSeaMap data and for Google AdMob (only free version) + Read and write external storage: For offline map availability and map data caching  In case you have any problems do not hesitate to contact me    Disclaimer  Liability for damages The use of our application at your own risk. We accept no liability for damages.
